Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/43rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 8 Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, 47th then normal route on Halsted, due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, 47th then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Wallace, Root, Normal, 43rd, Union, then resume their normal route on 47th due to construction near Halsted/43rd.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/91st.
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, 95th, Vincennes, Summit, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage at Halsted/91st.
